text: Seetha () is a 1970 Kannada romantic drama film directed actor Vadiraj and produced by actress Harini. The film starred Gangadhar, Kalpana and Srinath in lead roles.Seetha (ಸೀತಾ) cast and crew The film's soundtrack and score by Vijaya Bhaskar was widely acclaimed. == Cast == * Gangadhar * Kalpana * Srinath * Ramesh * K. S. Ashwath * Srilalitha * Seetharam * Indrani == Soundtrack == The music was composed by Vijaya Bhaskar with lyrics by R. N. Jayagopal.Seetha songs All the songs composed for the film were received extremely well and considered as evergreen songs. == References == Category:1970 films Category:Indian films Category:1970s Kannada-language films Category:Indian romantic drama films Category:Indian black-and-white films Category:Kannada film scores by Vijaya Bhaskar Category:1970 romantic drama films Category:1970 drama films
title: Seetha (1970 film)
